article_text:
SHANGHAI—Hedge-fund manager Kenneth C. Griffin's Citadel LLC has become the first foreign hedge fund to complete a yuan fundraising under a trial program that allows high net worth Chinese to invest abroad via foreign hedge funds.

Citadel and five other foreign hedge funds got approval in September from China's foreign-exchange regulator to each...
